snippet: Arizona State’s Trent Lockett, the team’s leading scorer last season, said he would transfer to Marquette for his senior season to be closer to his mother, who has cancer.
lead_paragraph: Arizona State’s Trent Lockett, the team’s leading scorer last season, said he would transfer to Marquette for his senior season to be closer to his mother, who has cancer.

headline.seo: Arizona State’s Lockett to Transfer to Marquette
headline.main: Arizona State’s Leading Scorer to Transfer
headline.print_headline: Arizona State’s Leading Scorer to Transfer
